questions.question: Your SSSV is set at 100m but regulations require 50m below mudline - confirm this meets requirements?
Perforating is planned underbalanced - what's your surface equipment configuration for well control?
Completion fluid is calcium bromide at 14.5 ppg - is this compatible with your formation and elastomers?
If packer fails to set at depth, what's your contingency? Can you re-run or do you need to change strategy?
Well test shows 3,000 bopd but separator is rated for 2,500 - has this been addressed?
Your sand control design is standalone screen but offset wells had screen erosion - should you consider gravel pack?
Tubing stress analysis shows 95% utilization - what's your safety margin for thermal cycling during production?
Chemical injection rate is 5 L/hr but umbilical capacity is 3 L/hr - how do you achieve target rate?
Perforating depth is based on LWD - what's your depth correlation plan to ensure correct interval?
Your downhole gauge is rated to 150°C but reservoir temperature is 145°C - what's your margin for temperature uncertainty?
If TCP guns misfire, what's your contingency for re-perforating?
Well handover documentation shows production expected in 30 days - is the tree control system commissioned and tested?
